mapper.sql: a.create_date as createDate, a.create_user_id as createUserId, a.update_date as updateDate, a.update_user_id as updateUserId, a.del_flg as delFlg
mapper.insert: insert into project_team ( create_date, create_user_id, update_date, update_user_id, del_flg ) values ( current_timestamp, #{createUserId}, current_timestamp, #{updateUserId}, '0' )
